name: We Will Huddle
description: $Huddle is the native utility token of Huddle.is â€” a clean, web-based dashboard built for holders in the Pudgy Penguins ecosystem. It allows users to monitor the value of their NFTs (Pudgy Penguins, Lil Pudgys, Pudgy Rods) and tokens like $PENGU in one secure, privacy-first interface.
